call_title: Moria Finance | Lgd and MGpai | ErgoHack VIII

decisions.decision: To focus on multisig service instead of time lock contract and reversible address contract
decisions.speaker: Luca
decisions.context: Due to time constraints during ErgoHack VIII
decisions.quote: Just due to the time constraint, we thought it'd be better to do the multisig service.

decisions.decision: To directly use the address provided by the creator instead of setting derivation index to zero as in EIP-42
decisions.speaker: Luca
decisions.context: Found it simpler for their use case
decisions.quote: instead of doing that, we just directly use the address provided by the creator, since we found this to just be simpler for our use case

decisions.decision: To use a relational database using PostgreSQL with Supabase
decisions.speaker: Luca
decisions.context: Need to pass data around from each signer during multisig process
decisions.quote: we decided to use a relational database using PostgreSQL with Supabase, since it's just easy to set up and easy to use APIs

decisions.decision: Code will remain closed source for now
decisions.speaker: mgPai
decisions.quote: our code will remain closed source for now

commitments.commitment: Implement Supabase Realtime for live chat messaging and notifications during the signing process
commitments.quote: We didn't get to implement this during the hackathon, but as a next feature, we're going to use Supabase Realtime

commitments.commitment: Captain Nemo will add the multisig signing methods to the official Nautilus wallet in the new release with the v3 manifest
commitments.quote: we'll be having Captain Nemo adding this to the official Nautilus wallet in the new release with the v3 manifest

commitments.commitment: Will be adding a fee to charge people for creating more accounts
commitments.quote: Later on, we'll be adding a fee to charge people for creating more accounts so we don't get spammed in our database and backend

commitments.commitment: Will implement dynamic updates instead of manual reload
commitments.quote: We'll be implementing stuff to make this dynamic in the future

commitments.commitment: Will be adding notifications in the future
commitments.quote: we'll be adding notifications in the future

key_facts.fact: ErgoHack VIII team consisted of five people: Luca, mgPai, Anastasia, Apollo, and Dimitri, as well as Captain Nemo
key_facts.speaker: Luca

key_facts.fact: Multisig follows the protocol outlined in EIP-42 with one modification
key_facts.speaker: Luca

key_facts.fact: Database has four main entities: confirmed user, multisig wallet, multisig unsigned transaction, and multisig signed transaction
key_facts.speaker: Luca

key_facts.fact: Two methods were added to the Nautilus fork: generate commitments for transaction and sign transaction multi
key_facts.speaker: mgPai

key_facts.fact: The project was completed over a weekend
key_facts.speaker: mgPai
